9 Most Heroic Animals of 2010 !!!

A Pomeranian-poodle mix called Bandit deserves to be listed as heroic pet because he prevented a tragedy and saved lives of DiStefani family from Mays Landing, New Jersey, on the night when toxic black smoke was filling the house. That night, a hair brush was being sterilized in a pot of boiling water when it began to melt and eventually black smoke filled the house while the family slept.

15 Ways to Hack Your Brain for a Better Life

Not everyone is born with a big brain. Not everyone can say things like ‘Elementary, my dear Watson’ with a straight face. But that doesn’t mean you can’t get an edge on the competition. Remember that scene from the Matrix, where the machines are using humans as disposable AA batteries? That’s not far off the mark. With over 100 billion neurons, your brain produces about 100 Watts of raw energy. The mind literally has a life of its own. And like your other muscles, the more you use it, the bigger it gets, the better it works.

1. Exercise
2. Hydrate
3. Find Stimulation
4. Think Happy Thoughts
5. Play Games
6. Watch Quality TV
7. Surf the Net
8. Eat Brain Food
9. Load Up On Fish Oil
10. Eat Weeds
11. Learn Something New
12. Don’t Waste Time
13. Actively Improve Your Memory
14. Rest
15. Have Sex

6 Easy Steps to Efficiently Repair a Leaking Shower Enclosur

Life is a process of learning new things, so one must constantly strive to learn newer stuff and also be self sufficient rather than depending upon people to do things for us. So Do It Yourself repairs for the bathroom make you just that and reduce the dependency on the plumber to a huge extent. So if you have some leakages here and there say for example the shower enclosure you can very well manage it yourself. Also save upon some bucks and use them up elsewhere.


1.  Clean and dry the shower area
2.  Remove the surface scratches
3.  Remove the existing caulk
4.  Remove mild dew and mould
5.  Apply moderate amount of caulk at the joints
6.  Check if for any leakages left

Top 5 Calvados Range of Bathroom Products from Home Of Ultra

The calvados range from home of ultra has the calvados finish featuring through all the products. The calvados range at Victorian Plumbing includes left as well as right hand option baths, as well as vanity units and cabinets in wall hung and floor standing styles. The designs are all robust and durable. With uncompromising design features and a promise of high quality they give a distinct look to the bathroom. The calvados finish combined with white ceramic looks extremely chic and stylish.

1. Ultra 800mm Calvados Wall Mounted Unit with Ceramic Basin

The wall mounted calvados product from the home of ultra has a high quality ceramic basin and also an equally robust and quality cabinet. The classy calvados finish is the highlight of the range. The product flaunts its soft close drawers and amazingly practical and beautiful design.

2. Ultra 600mm Calvados Wall Mounted Unit with Ceramic Basin

The Metal drawers being soft close provide ease of opening and closing. The manufacturing is of the highest standards and the fittings are perfect to allow the soft closing work properly. The drawers have chrome handles that enhance the look and make the bathroom look classy.

3. Nero 1700mm L Shape Square Shower Bath & Shaped Screen - Calvados (Left hand option)

It is manufactured using good quality high gloss acrylic to provide a stylish product for your bathroom. The shower bath is also available in a right hand option. The product includes a designer L shaped shower screen.

4. Ultra 800mm Calvados Floor Mounted Unit with Ceramic Basin

The floor standing vanity with a basin features a high quality calvados finish and sturdy metal drawers that personify practicality, usability and beauty.

5. Ultra 600mm Calvados Floor Mounted Unit with Ceramic Basin

It is a very modern and practical furniture option for your bathroom. The metal drawers have a soft closing feature and they are sure to last long for many years given the robust design and structure.
Use the calvados range throughout for your bathroom interior and create an appealing space for that time of recluse.

Bathroom Suite design For Disable

While planning a bathroom design for disable person, you have to consider number of things, consider the difficulties that elders and disabled person or a physically challenge or sick person would face while using a bathroom, ultimately there are two things which matters lots:

1. Construct bathroom in such a way that it provides safety experience.
2. focus on luxury and easy handling.

While safety is obviously a primary concern, easiness of bathing should not be overlooked. Bathroom suites for disable person is designed is such a way that it offers disabled person to bath without the aid of another person. The bathroom suite design for disable focuses on following areas.

1. Bathroom Entrance
To make enter /exit easy for handicap person you should design your bathroom with zero step entrance without a door. In order to keep privacy, you can use a sliding door and you can also use curtains at entrance that gives privacy without any physical obstacles. The handicap friendly entrance/exit for bathroom should have at least 32”.

2. Grab Bars:
Bathroom suites for disable person should includes grip and grabs bars at different prominent places such as near the toilet seat which provides support to a person while getting up, both sides of the sink. There are also the angled bars and those that have a good grip and grab both in one. Such bars prove very good so that they can also be used to hand a towel for keeping it handy everywhere and also to take support.

3. Slip resistant mates
Slip resistant mats must be including in bathroom suit that are design for disable that provide protection from slip.

http://bathroom-suites-uk.blogspot.com/2011/08/bathroom-suite-design-for-disable.html

Japanese style bathroom suite for Your Bathroom

The Japanese designs give very simple and artistic look. If you want a bit more artistic interior for your bathroom then you might rotate your eyes over Japanese style bathroom suites. Japanese culture values simplicity and the space in any place, it is as important as design elements. Japanese bathroom suites should have an uncluttered appearance and be decorated cautiously. The bathroom suite is a package which includes number of entities in such a way that they complement each other. Mostly, the Japanese interior consists of natural materials such as wide variety of beautiful stones, plants, clay, paper and fine wood that provides a graceful traditional look. A common characteristic that is steady in Japanese interior is that they are all low rising. The chairs and the stools or the couches are all very low rising and gives ample of comfort and relaxation. So this distinct feature of Japanese design carries itself in the bathroom.

The eye-catching beauty of a Japanese bathroom suite is modern yet very traditional due to its clean, uncluttered appearance. While Western bathroom suites are filled with Number of entities such as furniture, textiles, and elaborate decoration, but a Japanese bathroom suite seems almost unfilled in comparison. A lot of beauty in Japanese bathroom suite is comes from it’s timber frame carpentry and the natural materials used in construction. Japanese bathroom suite is then just not about "adding" additional items in the bathroom. Instead, the objective is to minimize distraction and provide graceful and elegant beauty of the design.
http://bathroom-suites-uk.weebly.com/

A Ultimate Kids Bathroom Suites for Your Kids

While picking your bathroom suite, you mainly emphasizes on your desires, wants and thoughts and kids usually don’t say anything while deciding which furnishing to be pick or in which way to decorate the place. Generally we fix adult suggestions, as contrasting to considering concretely from the physical and emotional desires of kids once they are working with the lavatory but we also have to take care kids emotions and ideas if you want your kids to be kind regarding daily habits such as wash hands just before taking meal, possess a each day shower immediately after gaining up, and many more.

You will need to make your bathroom suite an attractive, appealing and fascinating if not then it will be totally tedium and boredom for your kids to step in to the lavatory. Kids’ bathroom suites are a complete package of all the bathroom entities which perfectly complement each other and give a place that your kids like. The kid's bathroom suites contains lots of colours, you can choose a pink colour for your darling daughter and a blue colour for the sweet son.

There are also some kids bathroom suites are available in market that have the toilet and the basin in sliced football shape, this will astonishing for your naughty little football fan. There are many others kids’ bathroom suites like the Mickey Mouse themed bathroom suite, the underwater and aqua themed suites and many more. There are number of thing that you should keep in your mind while purchasing a kids bathroom suite, that it is effortlessly dry. If the floor or the bathtub is greasy and slippery, our kids may expediently slip above and hurt themselves. As a consequence, to provide security to our kids we ought to constantly maintain the bathroom dry and clean, so you can make your kids happy and joyful with kids’ bathroom suites.

Generally, young people are far more approachable to colours than adults. Therefore, an outstanding solution is to make allow young people to design their bathroom suites such a way that they feel comfort and happy with that design and ensure that furnishings will not be as well high for the little ones to attain. The bathroom suite should be design in such a way that provides young children a sense of soothe as complementary to inconvenience. Finally, constantly place some toys inside the bathroom in order that your kids will surely not feel lonely once they are getting in the bathroom.

Selecting A Perfect Bathroom suite

There are wide varieties of bathroom suites available in market that varyin style, shape and size, so you can select your bathroom suite according to your requirement and need. Before purchasing a new bathroom suite for your bathroom make a clear picture about what kind of look and feel you want for your bathroom. These days number of bathroom suites are available in market that suite every size of bathroom ranges from compact to the more spacious. If you do not have large area for bathroom then it doesn’t mean that you cannot create a bathroom suite with ample of style and fashion. There are wide ranges of space saving components available in market for small bathroom suites that are designed in such a way that they provide best use of available space.

The bathroom suites comprise all the elements that are necessary to provide complete look to your bathroom, be it basics such as a toilet seat, taps, mirrors or other accessories. A bathroom suite involves the selection of all the necessities of a bathroom as well as the plumbing, piping and fitting of it. The selection of the right kind of elements and accessories are very much crucial to building up of a perfect bathroom. When one wrong element is included in building a bathroom the entire bathroom suite can look incompatible and mismatched.

While selecting a perfect bathroom suite for your bathroom, dimension certainly matters a lot. Choosing a large bathroom suite for a small area bathroom or vice versa a small bathroom suite for a large bathroom would not be aesthetically agreeable. The character and period of the home must also be considered as this too will have an effect on the finished look.

You can select Vintage style bathroom suites for the large bathroom that have a very high ceiling. Vintage bathroom suite comprises of freestanding bath tub that have tiny feet and roll top, and a toilet with a long chain flush and a high cistern that will certainly look the part in an older style house. Very high standard tiles on the bathroom walls and floor, and jardinières with graceful greenery and flowering help to finish off the look.

The large ultra modern and stylish bathrooms comprises of high technology accessories such as Jacuzzi style bath tub and a separate shower cubicle. Ultra large bathrooms can also carry off the ‘his and hers’ choice of stylish basin. There are quite large numbers of styles available to choose including round glass bowls and square porcelain styles. High quality bathroom taps play a very vital role to complete the look of your bathroom.

Small bathroom suites in ultra modern houses are very easy to shop, a standard shower enclosure with simple shower doors, possibly with plain glass to give the delusion of a larger room, and smaller basins in a simple minimalistic design that helps to keep your bathroom modest. Minimalistic look is almost vital in smaller bathrooms as too much clutter makes the bathroom feel claustrophobic.

http://bathroom-suites.lifeyo.com/home/post/42209/selecting-a-perfect-bathroom-suite/

Complete Bathroom Suites from Victorian Plumbing Voted The B

The bathroom suites from Victorian plumbing come complete with a choice of different furniture and storage options. Storage is increasingly becoming one of the important aspects of a bathroom’s design, bathroom suites that offer good storage, coupled with great looks is a must. Standard bathroom suites come with a basin, toilet and bath, these are usually matching. Victorian Plumbing can offer furniture, under sink storage, bathroom panels all with similar finishes to create an overall theme. So if it is storage to match a back to wall WC cabinet, or any other item, Victorian Plumbing’s suites are perfect. Each element of the suites are designed and finished to complement the other.

A selection of some Various Comprehensive bathroom suites with furniture packs from Victorian plumbing

Full Luxurious Furniture & Bathroom Suite

The full luxurious furniture and bathroom suite is an all-inclusive suite design that includes a semi recessed square wash basin with an under sink unit, a fixing kit, a WC unit with a dual flush cistern, the cistern is concealed in a back to wall WC unit, a comfortable 1700mm bath and the beautiful frameless mirror adds to the beauty of the bathroom suite. It includes everything you would want for a bathroom.

Burlington Two vanity bathroom suite

The traditional bathroom suites from Burlington come in two finish options - a white or Oak finish. The product comes fully assembled and complete with a classic 2th basin an invisible overflow waste and a vanity unit. It also includes a bidet with back to wall bidet unit and a toilet with it’s BTW unit, a toilet seat and a bar hinge. The basin suites cabinet and the WCs and bidet unit are joined by a joining unit.

Hudson Reed Orb Complete Bathroom Package

The Hudson reed orb package is a complete bathroom suite. It can also be bought without the shower, fit to be used as cloakroom suites. It is a very compact, stylish and a modern design

Otley Vanity Unit Bathroom Suite

The Otley is a very high quality design and you can buy it at a price that can very easily compete with those at a bathroom suite sale. The suite is perfect for a bathroom renovation project on a shoestring budget.

Apart from these complete and comprehensive designs; Victorian plumbing houses a huge variety to choose from at extremely reasonable prices. The company has grown from a small workshop to one of the largest online retailers of bathroom products in the UK. VP’s success is down to unrelenting hard work, excellent customer support and utmost attention to customer satisfaction.

Bio: The company offers a great variety of bathroom suites to choose from. The range has modern, minimalistic and traditional bathroom suites ranging from the small cloakroom designs to the elaborate nine piece complete packages along with high quality cabinets and furniture.

Experience Royalty With Majestic And Royal Bathroom Suite

Bathroom suite plays a vital role in upgrading your bathroom look which is ultimately chosen according to your desire and requirement. You have to design your bathroom in such a way that it provides maximum relaxation, comfort, luxury and washes down your entire day’s worries and tensions. A bathroom consists of number of accessories, elements and components such as wash basin, bath tub, shower, toiletries and many more but these scattered and separated elements do not perfectly complement each other. A bathroom suite is a complete package of number of entities or collection of number of entities, which complement each other in a very beautiful manner, so buy at least the best that you can afford in term of both money as well as space. If you really have a very big bathroom space then you are blessed. You can very nicely make your bathroom functional and decorative with grand royal bathroom suites. A royal bathroom suite comprises of a big vanity unit with a very nicely framed royal looking bathroom mirror. It also contains grand looking stands with golden and silver tapestry and finishing’s on it. The “maharaja sofas” that is a king size couch with gold, silver and brocade embellished upholstery and the grand mirrors with traditional borders have intricately carved designs. The various shining golden accessories and royal chandeliers are the components that add up and provide a very rich and majestic interior for your bathroom. There are also majestic bathroom suites available in market for compact bathrooms. So no worries! If you want to give a royal touch in your small bathroom, then you can do so with this lavish majestic bathroom suite. You can experience royalty in your bathroom with these rich looking majestic bathroom suites. These royal bathroom suites really add opulence and grandiose to your bathroom interior.

Steam shower cabins- the modern day equivalent to the steam

Steam shower cabins require a water flow rate of at least 7.5 litres per minute with 1 to 3 bar of water pressure, and will perform at their best at a pressure of 2 to 3 bar. The water supply to the steam shower cabin must be balanced to prevent damage to the thermostatic cartridge. If you have a combo boiler you will probably need to buy a pressure equalizing valve to balance the water pressure to the

Top 5 Latest Range Of Black and White Decorative Shower Curt

With more and more people preferring black and white interiors the need for accessories such as shower curtains in black and white designs has increased. Wenko offers a range of decorative and ornamental black and white shower curtain for your black and white bathroom interiors.

1. Wenko Loops Polyester Shower Curtain
The Wenko Loops Polyester Shower Curtain is 100% polyester fabric and can be home washed easily- washable at 30°C. The shower curtain comes with 12 white plastic shower curtain rings.

2. Wenko Bouquet Nero Polyester Shower Curtain
The Wenko shower curtains are easy to care, durable and high quality. The designs in black and white have various ornamental as well as modern motifs that can give a choice for modern as well as the traditional set ups.

3. Wenko Ornamento Bianco Polyester Shower Curtain
The Wenko Ornamento Bianco is a shower curtain that brings in a posh and modern opulence in your bathrooms. you can also find other accessories like a bathroom set, bathroom bin and toilet brush holder, toilet seat etc from the Wenko Ornamento Bianco range of bathroom products.

4. Wenko Ornamento Nero Polyester Shower Curtain
The very rich yet a very modern striped and motif combination makes the curtain exclusive and very chic. All the fabric polyester curtains are priced at £24 and £25. With such beautiful curtains in black and white designs you can’t go wrong in achieving a perfect looking chic bathroom.

5. Wenko Flower PEVA Shower Curtain
The last but not the least is the Wenko Flower PEVA Shower Curtain. The PEVA material has both the water proof quality of the PVCs and the light weigh flowy feature of the textile curtains. Hence it is one of the best choices for your bathroom.
